noIssues: No issues were found in the provided log file.

errors.invalidFileType: Please provide a valid log file (must end with .log or .txt)
errors.analysisError: An error occurred while analyzing the log file. Please try again.

outOfMemory.solution: Increase the allocated RAM in your startup script (e.g., -Xmx4G for 4GB). Monitor memory usage and consider removing memory-intensive plugins

pluginLoading.solution: Plugin(s) {plugins} could not be loaded. Verify all required dependencies are installed and check plugin compatibility with your server version

networkTimeout.solution: Check your network connection, firewall settings, and server bandwidth. Consider increasing timeout values

pluginEvent.solution: Plugin(s) {plugins} are causing event processing errors. Check for plugin conflicts, ensure all plugins are up to date, and review plugin configurations
